record.dc:title: 19MU4b, 15MU4b, Muhlenberg County, Kentucky. Ashby Site. 15 Foot Profile.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: View of the 15 foot profile from the south. Shows the Plowed Stratum (A), the Mound Fill (B), Undisturbed Soil (C), and two recent Pot-holes, dug by C.B. Moore (D,E).
